    Job Description
As a Software Engineer - Backend in Financing team, you will get to experience designing, building and maintaining financing systems that serve Traveloka partners. In addition to working with fellow engineers, you will also work with Product Managers, Data, Designers, Quality, Operations, and other various stakeholders in order to build and deliver the best products and features that enable our customers to fly conveniently. Building an application is more than just writing code, you will be involved in the complete cycle of product development: ideation, design, implementation, and support.Software engineering takes the central roles for building Traveloka products and systems. You will:
Be responsible for designing, building, improving, or maintaining our backend applications, third-party data integration, data API, backend systems, or working with monitoring tools and infrastructure
Work in cross-functional teams and meet great people regularly from top tier technology, consulting, product, or academic background
Be encouraged to speak your mind, propose ideas, influence others, and continuously grow yourself
Participate and contribute to engineering hygiene such as code review, unit testing, and integration testing
Participate and contribute to the solution and architectural design review.
Participate in the service support as on-call
Participate and contribute to innovation and problem-solving
  Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent from a reputable university with good academic results is preferred.
Having minimum 3 years of experience in software engineering, application development or system development
Passion in software engineering, application development, or systems development
Excellent understanding of software engineering concepts, design patterns, and algorithms
Strong object-oriented analysis and design skills.
Good business acumen, excellent problem skills and broad understanding of software and system design.
Comfortable working up and down the technology stack.
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to know the Team
Come join Grab Fulfilment team, we're dedicated to building the most trusted and loved platform for all things food in Southeast Asia. When you're an engineer at Grab, you are part of the heart and soul of the company. Our passion is anchored in the work that we do, and this is reflected in the impact we make on hundreds of millions of lives on a daily basis. We are empowered by creating amazing services and tools that serve hundreds of millions of consumers, driving partners, and fellow grabbers. We are always looking to our delivery and dine in platforms, which requires the help of first-class android engineers. Our scale of production is huge, handling tens of millions of bookings every day. When you launch a new code, hundreds of millions of people will see what you are doing in a very short time. Operating at this level is difficult, but very beneficial. You will be reporting to the manager and the role will be Hybrid.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Lead project development as the engineering owner, collaborating with product managers to understand requirements and propose solutions.
Collaborate with product and experience teams to finalize feature specifications, build prototypes, and design experiments.
Work with the backend team to build modularized reusable components and design scalable APIs.
Design and write mobile components with Java, Kotlin, and Flutter to improve the availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of Grab's services on the Driver App.
Engage in Driver app stability investigation, application performance analysis, tuning, and optimization.
Work with different engineering teams to explore and create new design/architectures geared towards scale and performance.
Participate in code and design reviews to maintain high development standards.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
A degree in computer science, software engineering or related fields with 5+ years of working experience on mobile application development
Programming experience in Java or Kotlin, familiarity with design patterns, multi-threading, and good coding style and habits.
Understanding of the Android system and programming paradigm including OOP, TDD, reactive patterns, and dependency injection.
Familiarity with AndroidSDK, understanding of Android infrastructure, components, UI, data storage etc.
Working knowledge of several architectural approaches including clean architecture, MVP, and MVVM.
Experience in Android automated testing, familiarity with Android testing frameworks like Espresso, UI Automator, Mockito, Powermock, or Appium.
Fluent in English, with a conscientious, and teamwork, and a positive and optimistic outlook.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Descriprions:
 Performing all process design and calculation at proposal stage and project execution stage covering conceptual, basic and detail design
Review ITB Documents

Modify and optimize equipment and processes

Generate process report using HSYS

 Bachelor's Degree of Chemical Engineering
Experience min. 8 years as Process Engineer (preferably in EPC)

Job Description:
Mengembangkan dan memelihara aplikasi backend yang skalabel dan aman menggunakan Node.js.
Bekerja sama dengan tim developer lainnya untuk mendesain dan mengimplementasikan solusi teknis.
Memastikan code yang ditulis bersih, efisien, dan dapat di-maintain dengan baik sesuai dengan standard code yang sudah ada.
Melakukan debugging dan troubleshooting untuk menyelesaikan masalah yang muncul.
Melakukan integrasi dengan layanan pihak ketiga dan API eksternal.
Mengoptimalkan performa aplikasi agar tetap responsif dan scalable.
Job Requirement:
Pendidikan: S1 dalam Ilmu Komputer/TI atau pengalaman kerja yang setara.
Pengalaman: Minimal 2 tahun sebagai Back End Developer dengan Node.js.
Usia Maksimal 25 Tahun
Teknologi:
Penguasaan Node.js dan framework, seperti Express.js.
Pengalaman dengan database relasional (MySQL, PostgreSQL) dan NoSQL (MongoDB).
Pemahaman mendalam tentang RESTful API dan pengembangan server-side.
Familiar dengan Git, Docker, dan cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Pengalaman dengan CI/CD pipeline dan TDD adalah nilai tambah.
Keterampilan:
Kemampuan analitis dan pemecahan masalah yang kuat.
Komunikasi efektif dan kolaborasi tim.
Manajemen waktu yang baik dan mampu bekerja mandiri.

Tanggung Jawab :
Merencanakan desain database dan pemrograman sistem, sesuai dengan kebutuhan aplikasi bisnis agar dapat diaplikasikan
Merencanakan dan menangani spesifikasi fungsional, pengembangan sistem, instalasi, integrasi sistem, dan pelaksanaan tes, agar seluruh aktivitas tersebut berjalan dengan baik
Menangani proyek-proyek yang terkait dengan IT Business Analyst untuk memastikan proyek tersebut sesuai target
Merancang, dan menulis program komputer, dokumen rancangan program, coding program, dan pemeliharaan untuk menangani kebutuhan bisnis tertentu serta memungkinkan perubahan di masa depan
Melakukan konsultasi untuk menentukan kebutuhan dan analisa kebutuhan internal IT agar dapat memberikan solusi secara tepat waktu dan akurat pada hasilnya
 Kualifikasi:
S1 dengan latar belakang pendidikan Sistem Informatika/ Teknik Informatika
Pengalaman kerja minimal 2-3 tahun di bidang IT System Development atau AI
Kompetensi teknis (Hard Skills)
Pengetahuan mengenai bisnis ERP secara umum
Pengetahuan dasar teknologi pemrograman (C/C++, Java,JavaScript, atau Node.js,
Pengalaman dalam desain dan pengembangan perangkat IoT (sensor, aktuator, dan protokol komunikasi)
Pengalaman dengan platform IoT seperti AWS IoT, Google Cloud IoT, atau Microsoft Azure IoT, Pemahaman tentang machine learning, deep learning, dan teknik AI-based automation.
Pengalaman dengan framework TensorFlow, PyTorch, atau scikit-learn.
Pemahaman mengenai keamanan siber terkait perangkat IoT, enkripsi data, dan pengelolaan identitas.
 Jika memiliki sertifikasi khusus bidang IoT / AI akan menjadi nilai tambah.
Kompetensi non teknis (Soft Skills)
Kemampuan konseptual
Pengaturan dan pengorganisasian
Perhatian terhadap hal detail

It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
    Job Description
As a Software Engineer in the Financing Web Engineering Team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping Financing web-related products in Traveloka. You will work with a dynamic team of engineers, product managers, designers, data analysts, and QA engineers to deliver exceptional web experiences in our customer-facing web application and operational tools.
Some of your responsibilities if you choose to join:
Translating product and design requirements to high-performance and scalable user interfaces using the latest web standards and frameworks.
Performing technical assessment and impact analysis for product and technical initiatives.
Maintaining reliability and implementing incremental improvements to our web application and operational tools.
Producing high-quality front-end code while developing, testing, and debugging our web products.
Delivering web products independently while working closely with all relevant stakeholders.
In Traveloka, we believe technology is there to solve business problems. If you are a motivated and strategic professional passionate about driving engineering excellence, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our continued success.
  Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent from a reputable university.
3+ years of professional web development experience.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React is mandatory.
Strong comprehension of JavaScript promises and asynchronous programming.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude.
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Strong communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
A passion for keeping up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
Having experience in React Native or other hybrid mobile apps development is a plus.
Having experience with Node.js and building automation solutions is a plus.
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Job Title: Looking for Cloud Infrastructure Experienced Hire
Job Description:
Acting as L1.5/L2 technical operations for break-fix and incident response
Provision and manage cloud services to meet demand requirements (e.g., compute, storage, networking)
Perform system administration on Windows and Linux OS (e.g., installation, configuration, maintenance, and software updates)
Perform maintenance, vulnerability patching, and performance optimization of cloud services and workloads
Implement orchestration platforms and CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment
Monitor performance and ensure reliability of cloud resources, servers, and containers
Continuously improve cloud service delivery and gather initiatives for cost optimizations and savings
Maintain asset information in CMDB and generate regular cloud service delivery reporting
Create documentation including standards, procedures, and knowledge base articles
Join client call on technical discussion as required
Support the operations on-call rotation
Pro-active engagement for improvement of overall infrastructure operations and managed services
 Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field, or equivalent work experience
Proven work experience as a Cloud Engineer or similar role, with specific expertise in AWS cloud services
Hands-on experience with infrastructure deployment and configuration management tools (e.g., CloudFormation, Terraform, Ansible)
Proficient with Windows and Linux / Unix-based operating systems
Good understanding of networking principles and protocols (e.g., TCP/IP, DNS, VPN)
Experience with monitoring, alerting, and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana)
Experience with scripting (e.g., PowerShell, Bash, Python) and automation tools (e.g., Ansible, Puppet, Chef)
Good analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail
Familiar with ServiceNow CMDB or ITSM / ITIL framework
Proficient in drafting technical specifications and documenting system changes
Good English communication skills both written and verbal
Certifications such as AWS Certified Associate levels, CCNA, CompTIA, and RHCSA is a plus
Experience in managing large-scale enterprise server environments is a plus
Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools and DevOps practices is a plus

Design, implement, and maintain secure CI/CD pipelines to facilitate automated deployment and scaling of applications
Integrate security practices into DevOps processes and workflows from development, testing, through to production
Implement and manage infrastructure-as-code (IaC) tools and practices to automate provisioning and configuration of environments securely

Implement and maintain security controls and monitoring in cloud and on-premises environments
Collaborate closely with development, operations, and security teams to ensure alignment of security goals with business objectives
Continuously research and evaluate emerging security technologies and best practices to improve the organization's security posture
Provide guidance and support to teams on security best practices, tools, and techniques
Create documentation including standards, procedures, and knowledge base articles
Join client call on technical discussion as required
Support the operations on-call rotation
Pro-active engagement for improvement of overall infrastructure operations and managed services
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or related field, or equivalent practical experience
Proven work experience as a DevOps Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer, or similar role
Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Azure DevOps)
Experience with infrastructure automated deployment and configuration management tools (e.g., CloudFormation, Terraform, Ansible, Chef)
Experience managing cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Strong understanding of networking principles and protocols (e.g., TCP/IP, DNS, VPN)
Solid understanding of containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
Ability to script and automate tasks using scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell)
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a strong attention to detail
Familiar with ServiceNow CMDB or ITSM / ITIL framework
Proficient in drafting technical specifications and documenting system changes
Good English communication skills both written and verbal
Certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect or AWS Certified DevOps Engineer
Previous experience in software engineering roles
Experience in managing large-scale server environments

What We're Looking For:
Minimum 2 years of related work experience is a must
Degree in MIS, Computer Science, related field or equivalent experience
Good understanding of the Go, Gin framework, SQL server , no SQL , MongoDB , Zerolog .
Have experience in MVC development .
Development using Cleancode patern .
Experienced in designing, coding and testing web applications and supporting web services for apps
Knowledge of Web API programming is advantageous
MSSQL Reporting Services / Enterprise Reporting experience will be an advantage
 What You'll Do:
 Develop application from scratch
Write high-quality, clean, maintainable code using engineering best practices
Understand the products, analyze requirements, design and develop features, constantly identify and fix problems, improve reliability, and improve user experience.
Working with fast pace and multiple projects.
Collaborating within cross-functional and international agile teams.

Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
The MEX App Flutter team builds and maintains the comprehensive merchant app for merchants to manage their business on Grab. Our team comprises experienced engineers with a shared passion on improving merchant experience. Join us on creating and implementing solutions aimed at enhancing the merchant experience.
Get to Know the Role
As a Flutter engineer, you are expected to work on both product development and engineering improvements.
We are looking for a Software Engineer who strives for excellence in your work. If you believe you have what it takes, we'd love to hear from you. This role is a hybrid role based in Jakarta. You will be reporting to an Engineering Manager for this role.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Develop new features and improvements for mobile applications, ensuring robustness, performance, and an excellent user experience.
Write reusable, scalable, and testable code, ensuring on-time delivery with high quality.
Maintain existing mobile applications, including bug fixing and performance enhancements.
Participate in technical discussions, code reviews, and knowledge sharing with engineering teams.
Write unit and integration tests, collaborating with QAs to ensure app releases.
Work with product and design teams to translate requirements into technical solutions.
Participate in agile development processes and on-call rotations, staying updated on industry trends and suggesting process improvements.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
3+ years of mobile development experience with 2+ years in Flutter engineering, fluent in Dart programming.
Experience with programming paradigms like OOP, TDD, reactive programming, and dependency injection.
Familiar with several architectural approaches, including clean architecture such as MVVM.
Experience in writing maintainable and testable code, including API design, unit testing, and UI testing techniques.
Proficient in maintaining high user base applications using crash analytics, remote debugging, and continuous integration.
Experience with optimizing app performance, including network data usage, battery usage, storage, app size, and launch time.
Experience in iOS/Android native development.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

What We're Looking For:
Minimum 2 years of related work experience is a must
Degree in MIS, Computer Science, related field or equivalent experience
Good understanding of the Go, Gin framework, SQL server , no SQL , MongoDB , Zerolog .
Have experience in MVC development .
Development using Cleancode patern .
Experienced in designing, coding and testing web applications and supporting web services for apps
Knowledge of Web API programming is advantageous
MSSQL Reporting Services / Enterprise Reporting experience will be an advantage
 What You'll Do:
 Develop application from scratch
Write high-quality, clean, maintainable code using engineering best practices
Understand the products, analyze requirements, design and develop features, constantly identify and fix problems, improve reliability, and improve user experience.
Working with fast pace and multiple projects.
Collaborating within cross-functional and international agile teams.
 Benefit :

Outing 
Gathering employee
Insurance corporate 
BPJS TK KS 
Internet Allowance

Set up equipment for employee use, performing and ensuring proper installation of cables, operating systems, or appropriate software

Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
The Fulfilment tech family is one of the most important pillars allowing Grab to out-serve our customers and partners in different businesses and marketplaces across Southeast Asia. Our mission is to offer the best products and experiences to our driver partners as to increase adoption and engagement of our services.
Supply Planning is one of Fulfilment Tech Family's empowered teams with goals to help drivers get more jobs and get them faster by understanding the marketplace condition and position drivers in the right time and location. The Supply Planning team has different products like heatmap, hot spot navigation, driver shifts, dynamic incentives, and so on.
Get to Know the Role 
We are looking for Engineers to join our team. You will have opportunities to work on driver apps that are used by millions of driver partners everyday. It is very important that our team members take the projects to identify problems and have the right mindset and skills to solve them.
This is a hybrid role and the office is based in Jakarta.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Design mobile components with Swift to enhance availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of Grab's Driver App services.
Investigate Driver app stability, perform application performance analysis, and optimize for better performance.
Collaborate with backend teams to build modular, reusable components and design scalable APIs.
Work with product and experience teams to finalize feature specifications, build prototypes, and design experiments.
Join on-call rotations to debug production issues and enhance system stability.
You will be reporting to an Engineering Manager
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
You have at least 2+ years of iOS development experience and a foundation in algorithms and data structures.
You have familiar with programming paradigms such as OOP, TDD, reactive programming and dependency injection.
You have a working knowledge of several architectural approaches including clean architecture like MVVM or VIPER.
You have experience writing maintainable and testable code, including API design, unit testing and UI testing techniques, experience working with a UI library.
You have good experience about CI/CD implementation
Additional Information
Life at Grab

We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Position: IT Admin/DevOps Expert
We are looking for YOU, an IT Admin/DevOps Expert that can help us planning, establishing, and maintaining IT services and development operations for Pluvia.
You will be part of a growing team providing unique and state of the art prediction services using Machine Learning for weather and flood forecasts to various clients as well being involved in software related projects. These clients include, but not limited to, big clients in SE Asia providing transport and distribution services as well as other private clients and governmental organizations. We are a growing company and are looking for dedicated people that help us grow with their skills and know-how. 
You will be based in Jakarta, where we are growing a team that will be responsible for development, deployment, maintenance, and daily operations of such services and projects, leveraging what our data scientists and domain experts create into commercial services and products.
You will report directly to Pluvia’s Head of Engineering/Chief Software Architect, having a local Team Lead in Jakarta as a daily functional reference.
At Pluvia:
Pluvia, the world leader in tropical rain forecasting, offers game-changing hyperlocal rain forecasts with unprecedented accuracy. Pluvia integrates data from multiple sources into our Meteorology Algorithm to produce best-in-class rain forecasts, down to a 100m grid. We turn forecasts into actionable insights.
We are a company with multiple nationalities where we excel for a good interaction and cultural exchange among all.
About you:
To possess a degree in Computer Science or related area
Be fluent in English, both spoken and written as we are a multi nationalities company. Your daily functional reference (Local Team Lead in Jakarta) is in Bahasa.
Proven solid experience with IT online services administration and maintenance (mandatory)
Proven solid experience with DevOps in the Azure ecosystem (mandatory).
Ability and flexibility to travel in SE Asia when required (mainly Singapore where Pluvia has its HQ)
Be a good team player and mentor to other team members on a daily basis but mostly when it’s of utmost importance.
Be a pro-active person that can anticipate challenges but also react when new challenges arise.
Be a person with a positive attitude and a “Can Do” mentality.
Possess the ability to plan strategical changes in terms of development operations when the need becomes apparent.
We expect you to have mastered some of the following tech skills:
Online services administration like emails, domains, DNS
Possess knowledge of various Azure services like Azure Container Registry, Azure Container Instance, Azure Logic App, Azure App Service, Azure Blob Storage, and Azure Database for PostgreSQL.
Monitor service stability, performance, and uptime; formulate strategies for scaling up/out and down/in
Proficiency in scripting with PowerShell and Azure CLI.
Manage source control using Git, encompassing branching strategy, pull request workflows, and version control.
Develop CI/CD pipelines using tools like Azure DevOps for automating the build, test, and deployment processes in the current system.
Create and manage infrastructure utilizing ARM templates and IaC principles; familiarity with Terraform or Bicep is an advantage.
Manage pipeline security and safeguard sensitive information.
Be familiar with both Windows and Linux environments.
Familiarity with Python is a plus

Job Title: Mandarin Speaking Staff and English Speaking Senior Level
Job Description:
SUS ENVIRONMENT is hiring. Please submit your resume according to your experience and interest for the following positions (please noted in resume letter): Business Development Manager, Business Development Assistant Manager, HR and Admin Supervisor, Admin Assistant, Purchasing Supervisor, Accounting / Finance, Engineer Assistant , EHS Engineer, Document Controller
 1. Business Development Manager
Job Responsibilities:
Responsible for identifying and developing new business opportunities, expanding business, and driving business growth for the environmental company. This includes establishing contact with potential clients, formulating strategic plans, coordinating internal resources to achieve business goals, preparing necessary documentation, and completing other tasks assigned by superiors.
Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or higher;
2. Proficient in English and Indonesian; English proficiency preferred;
3. Over 5 years of experience in market/business development or related fields, with experience in Public-Private Partnership (PPP) project management, strong market development skills, and a successful work history;
4. Excellent and extensive social and integration skills.
 2. Business Development Assistant Manager
Job Responsibilities:
Support the Business Development Manager by preparing necessary document and completing other tasks assigned by Manager.
Job Requirements:
Proficiency in English is preferred.
Fresh graduates welcome to apply.
 3. Administrative Supervisor
Job Responsibilities:
1. Handle official documents promptly.
2. Manage and safeguard the company's project seals and departmental stamps, ensuring they are used according to regulations.
3. Compile and summarize monthly and annual departmental expense reports, and draft monthly and annual expense budgets.
4. Oversee the procurement of office supplies, office consumables, fixed assets, gifts, and manage department contract payments.
5. Manage company-level reception duties (including confirmation of the reception manual).
6. Handle administrative procurement, ticketing, hotel reservations, and coordinate company vehicle arrangements for external trips.
Job Requirements:
1. Associate’s degree or higher in Human Resources Management, Administrative Management, or related fields.
2. Minimum of 3 years of relevant work experience.
3. Knowledgeable in human resources management and administrative management.
4. Fluent in Mandarin, English, and Indonesian (both spoken and written).
5. Proficiency in formal administrative document writing in English and Indonesian.
6. Strong communication and problem-solving skills.
7. For candidates with exceptional language skills in Mandarin, English, and Indonesian, conditions may be relaxed.
 4. Administrative Assistant
Job Responsibilities:
1. Assist the Admin Supervisor with daily tasks.
Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor’s degree or higher.
2. Valid driver’s license.
3. Detail-oriented with strong willpower; clear logical thinking; personable with strong communication and expression skills; proficient in MS Office and skilled in writing and organizational abilities. Proficient driving skills.
 5. Finance/Accounting
Job Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for project financial records, accounting, and bookkeeping, including fund payments, expense reimbursements, and bank reconciliations.
2. Prepare financial statements, budgets, and financial analyses to ensure data accuracy and compliance.
Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor’s degree or higher in Finance or a related field.
2. Familiarity with international accounting standards and financial management; some project financial management experience; fluent in English.
3. Financial certification (i.e CPA  certification) is preferred.
 6. Engineer Assistant 
Job Responsibilities:
1. Assist project engineers with technical support and management for power projects, including planning, design, implementation, and monitoring.
2. Responsible for technical document organization, progress tracking, site coordination, and problem-solving to ensure project completion on time and to quality standards.
3. During the operational phase, handle maintenance and equipment management.
Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor’s degree or higher in Thermal Power, Mechanical Manufacturing, Electrical Engineering, Instrumentation, or related fields.
2. Experience in power plant boilers, turbines, flue gas, environmental chemistry, or maintenance-related work.
3. Strong communication and coordination skills; experience in waste-to-energy plant construction and operation preferred.
 7. EHS Engineer
Job Responsibilities:
1. Manage environment, health, and safety (EHS) on-site to ensure compliance with local regulations and company standards.
2. Conduct risk assessments, develop EHS plans, implement training, oversee safety operations and incident investigations, and drive improvement measures.
Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor’s degree or higher in Energy and Power Engineering, Electrical Automation, Environmental Engineering, Safety Engineering, or related fields.
2. Possess EHS certification required by Indonesian regulations.
3. Relevant experience in safety and environmental work at thermal power plants or waste-to-energy plants.
4. Familiarity with EHS-related laws and regulations, ability to handle emergency EHS incidents, strong sense of responsibility, good stress resistance, and strong writing skills.
 8. Purchasing Supervisor
Job Responsibilities:
1. Oversee procurement of project equipment and materials, develop procurement plans, and manage supplier selection and relationships.
2. Coordinate procurement, logistics, and customs clearance to ensure timely delivery of materials.
3. Control procurement costs and ensure quality standards are met.
Job Requirements:
1. Background in electrical power or related fields, understanding of procurement processes and supply chain management.
2. Good English communication skills and negotiation abilities; familiarity with international trade and logistics; overseas project procurement experience preferred.
 9. Document Controller
Job Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for collecting, organizing, archiving, and safeguarding project documents, ensuring version control and updates.
2. Maintain project progress, construction records, and other data.
3. Assist various departments with document coordination, ensuring accurate and timely information flow.
Job Requirements:
1. Degree in Engineering or related fields; familiar with project management software; strong communication and organizational skills.
2. Good English proficiency; ability to adapt to an overseas working environment; experience with overseas engineering projects preferred.

About the Company: 
 
Akar Inti Teknologi (AIT) is a full-service software house headquartered in Jakarta that focuses on helping companies excel in their digital transformation. We pride ourselves on building solutions that go beyond mere functionality, aiming for reliability and scalability that exceed expectations. With a portfolio of successful projects for renowned brands in diverse industries, our track record speaks for itself.  
 
From our roots in banking and financial institutions, we've expanded our reach to help drive digitalization in diverse industries such as financial services, loyalty programs, healthcare, lifestyle brands, and beyond. 
 
Our journey has traveled remarkable distances, propelled not solely by our innovative solutions, but by the dedication and brilliance of our exceptional #AITteam. They embody our vision, drive, and unwavering commitment, driving us forward into boundless achievement. On top of this, we foster a culture of #TeamLIT (Teamwork, Learning, Innovation and Transparency). Through our culture, we ensure all of our #AITteam can perform and thrive to their fullest potential. 
 
About the People: 
We believe in putting our people first, which is why we've created an environment where great work is not only recognized but encouraged and celebrated. With a strong emphasis on teamwork, learning, innovation, and transparency, our #TeamLIT culture empowers every team member to reach their full potential. We offer unparalleled learning opportunities and benefits designed to support our employees in both their personal and professional growth. From comprehensive training programs to flexible work arrangements, we strive to create an environment where everyone can thrive.  
 
Our team members are not just employees; they are valued collaborators, each bringing their unique talents and perspectives to the table. There's a spirit of camaraderie that permeates every aspect of our organization, where egos are left at the door, and the focus remains on collective progress. Whether you're a seasoned professional or a newcomer to the industry, you'll find that our team is welcoming, supportive, and eager to help you thrive. Together, we work towards common goals, pushing boundaries and breaking barriers, because we understand that our success is intertwined. 
 
Become part of our journey, where together, we will innovate our way to success. Don’t worry, you are in good hands. 
About the Role: As the Technical Lead, you will be responsible to guide the development team in delivering high-quality software solutions. Your role will involve mentoring developers, making key architectural decisions, and closely collaborating with stakeholders to align technical direction with business goals. Expertise in Node.js (NestJS), Postgres, and Microservices architecture is essential for this role. 
Responsibilities: 
Lead and manage a team of developers, offering technical guidance, mentorship, and fostering a collaborative environment. 
Architect, design, and implement scalable, high-performance software solutions using Node.js (NestJS), Postgres, and Microservices architecture. 
Perform comprehensive code reviews, ensuring adherence to best practices, coding standards, and robust security protocols. 
Continuously monitor, optimize, and enhance application performance, ensuring system reliability, scalability, and efficiency.

Job Title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET)
Job Description:
What we do
At Coda, we break down barriers between publishers and their audiences by thinking outside of the app. Coda is trusted by 300+ top digital content publishers  – including industry giants Activision Blizzard, Bigo, Electronic Arts, Riot Games, and Zynga – to grow revenue, profit margins, and customer engagement in 60+ markets with ease. For publishers, this means less lift, more players and more payers. For players, Coda’s solutions allow them to pay for play their way.
Our winning formula? A laser-focused, pragmatic attitude coupled with an unwavering commitment to excellence. We are customer-centric, creative, and solution-oriented, always delivering to our users the top-tier entertainment content they want at competitive prices.
If you’re ambitious, bold and ready to take your career to the next level, get in touch!
Engineering - Technology at Coda 
At Coda, our goal is to make our mark in the high-volume payments and e-commerce industry – and we are levelling up fast. To stay in stride with the dynamic environment, we focus on building robust, distributed systems that can effortlessly handle traffic spikes. Moreover, our ambitious roadmap necessitates innovative tools to streamline the development lifecycle and sustain our swift momentum.
We place great value on balancing teamwork with individual autonomy, allowing our teams to make the most of modern cloud infrastructure. Our tech stack is solidly based on AWS cloud, with a keen interest in infrastructure-as-code and the creation of new microservices via the Quarkus framework. Our toolbox includes JSON and GRPC, multiple data storage integrations, queues, OpenTelemetry, and more.
But what truly defines us? It's our incredible team. We hire top talent and give them the freedom to push Coda's technology and products to exciting new levels. We believe that genius can strike anywhere, so we promote ownership and cultivate a servant leadership culture that lets engineers take the reins on features.
Develop test automation for complex API, web and mobile based applications
Creates and maintains automated test cases, executes test suites, reviews and diagnoses reported bugs, and ensures overall system quality prior to a customer release
Designs, develops, maintains, and troubleshoots automated suites of tests through continuous integration
Works with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the development cycle
Reproduce bugs, isolate problems and verify fixes
Estimates own testing tasks and works productively with minimum supervision while showing excellent team attitude.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in computer science/engineering or related field required.
3 to 5 years of hands-on testing experience including automation
Possesses strong coding skills and a passion for automation engineering
Experience using a variety of test automation tooling e.g. Selenium Webdriver, Postman or similar
Familiar with TestNG framework or similar
Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, JavaScript
Debugging tools: Dev ToolsBroad experience with CI tools & technologies (TeamCity/Jenkins, Git)Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS) and containerization (Docker)
Follows state of the art engineering practices, and encourages new practices where appropriate
Actively works towards personal, team, and company OKRs
Knowledge of tools such as Appium, Cypress and K6 for load testing
Knowledge of linux commands and shell scripting
Working at Coda
Joining the Coda team means diving into a fast-paced, challenging, and exciting world. With Codans spread across over 30 countries around the world, our highly collaborative environment breaks down time zones and cultural barriers, empowering you to chase innovative ideas, contribute to Coda’s growth, and make a lasting impact. 
If you have a passion for pushing boundaries, and thrive on continuous improvement through experimentation, we'd love to hear from you!
Our Perks*
WFH / Hybrid Support: Get a monthly allowance to cover your work-from-home expenses and keep you connected.
Wellness Boost: Stay healthy with resources for physical and mental well-being with our flexible benefits and Employee Assistance Program - because you matter!
Customized Benefits: Tailor your benefits with our flexible plan.
Growth Opportunities: Unlock your potential through clear progression paths.
Skill Development: Access training resources to fuel your personal and professional growth.
Volunteer Time Off: Enjoy paid time off to make a difference in the world through volunteering.
Family Care: Take advantage of paid Family Care Leave to bond with your family, while our selected Flexible Benefits also cater to your family's needs.
*Benefits are reviewed and updated on a yearly basis, and are applicable to full-time employees only.
We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, embracing the unique qualities of every individual, regardless of gender, race, age, religion, disability, or other local protected classes. Our goal is to foster an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome and valued.
Due to the large number of exceptional applications we receive, we can only reach out to shortlisted candidates. If you don't hear from us, rest assured there may be another opportunity at Coda that aligns better with your unique abilities. Remember to check our Careers Page for more exciting job openings!

Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
Automation and Platform Excellence (APEX) aim to Deliver Joy and Excellence to Grab engineers by ensuring a smooth ecosystem, allowing focus on value-adding features for users in a fast and safe manner. Some folks and companies would recognise this as a "Platform Engineering Team", and that is what we do.
Get to Know the Role
When you're an engineer at Grab, you are part of the heart and soul of the company. Our passion is anchored in the work that we do, and this is reflected in the impact we make on millions of lives on a daily basis. Grab Engineering is empowered by creating amazing services and tools that serve millions of passengers, driving partners, and fellow Grabbers. You will report to Senior Software Engineering Manager and will have hybrid arrangement of working.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will build foundational tools so that Grab engineers don't have to reinvent the wheel
You will work with Grab engineers to solve their custom problems, and make them more productive.
You will work with your team on the following:
Develop and maintain the team's future roadmap, ensure it aligns with organizational goals.
Run sprints, plan out the work for the sprint, maintaining a high level of productivity and focus.
Architect efficient and scalable backend systems tailored to Grab's needs.
Write unit, functional, and end-to-end tests to ensure to produce reliable code and system
Safely roll-out large changes and updates that impact hundreds of engineers across the organization.
Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues to maintain optimal system performance.
Participate in design discussions and code reviews to ensure good of system excellence.
Be part of an on-call rotation for the services the team owns, and participate in post-mortems for incident resolution.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
7 years of experience in developing large-scale engineering products and services, with strong computer science fundamentals.
3+ years of experience in managing and growing teams of 5 or more software engineers.
Experience communicating updates and resolutions to customers and other partners both high-level strategies and technical details across various teams and to senior management.
Proficiency in both frontend and backend development, particularly with Go and React.js.
Strong experience in developing cloud infrastructure and familiarity with orchestration technologies like Kubernetes (K8s).
Deep knowledge of web frameworks, data stores, microservices, and networking concepts.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

    Job Description
Backend Infrastructure Engineering team in Traveloka is looking for an experienced and passionate software engineer, who strives to continuously improve the quality of our entire software delivery lifecycle to further optimize our fellow engineers’ performance. Our ideal candidate thrives in a fast-paced environment, enjoys solving complex problems, and comfortable working with stakeholders from various backgrounds. We need someone who has excellent problem solving skills, strong technical skills, and demonstrates the ability to navigate complex organization structures.
As a Backend Infrastructure Engineer, you will be working with Product Engineers and other Central Engineering Teams to build, maintain, and improve our technology and processes in the entire software delivery lifecycle. You may find yourself working on our backend application frameworks, CI/CD pipelines, cloud technologies, and monitoring tools. You should have a high level of curiosity to learn new things as you will have to expand your knowledge continuously to comfortably move up, down, left, and right the entire technology stack. You should be someone who has strong communication skills and enjoys working with other fellow engineers to collaboratively solve complex problems.
Responsibilities
Maintain and improve various internal frameworks, tools, and platforms relied by product engineering teams in their software development life cycle
Collaborate with product engineering teams to discover common problems and/or potential improvements, as well as building the solutions and/or the improvements
Collaborate with cross-functional central teams to ensure we have embedded relevant best practices and removed vulnerabilities in our backend systems
Conduct research and experimentation on new technologies, solutions, and practices to further optimize backend engineering to deliver business value
Provide support to product engineering teams on technology migration and transformation
Share knowledge through documentation, articles, blogs, and presentations
  Requirements
A degree in Computer Science or equivalent from a reputable university
5+ years of software engineering experience, preferably in highly distributed system and large organization
Deep understanding of software engineering concepts, design patterns, architectures, and best practices
Deep understanding of continuous delivery concepts and best practices
Passion in software engineering and desire to continuously improve
Excellent analytical thinking and problem solving skills
Excellent research and experimentation skills
Comfortable working with the entire SDLC technology stack
Comfortable working with cross-domain, cross-functional, and international teams
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Excellent project planning and management skills
Knowledge and experience in Java is a plus
Knowledge and experience in CI/CD is a plus
Knowledge and experience in databases is a plus
Knowledge and experience in AWS and Terraform is a plus
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Job Desk:
Estimasi Biaya Proyek:
Menghitung biaya proyek secara keseluruhan, mulai dari peralatan mekanikal, elektrikal, sistem pendingin, hingga tenaga kerja dan waktu pelaksanaan.
Menyusun Rencana Anggaran Biaya (RAB) yang rinci dan akurat.
Analisis Kebutuhan Proyek:
Melakukan analisis kebutuhan material, alat, dan sumber daya manusia untuk proyek cold storage.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim teknik untuk memahami spesifikasi teknis dan menentukan kebutuhan biaya yang sesuai.
Mengevaluasi Penawaran Vendor:
Mengumpulkan dan mengevaluasi penawaran harga dari vendor dan pemasok terkait material dan peralatan yang dibutuhkan.
Melakukan negosiasi dengan vendor untuk mendapatkan harga terbaik dan memastikan kualitas barang yang ditawarkan sesuai dengan standar.
Penyusunan Proposal dan Dokumen Proyek:
Menyusun dokumen penawaran proyek yang mencakup estimasi biaya, jadwal pelaksanaan, dan rincian teknis yang diperlukan.
Memberikan rekomendasi kepada manajemen atau klien terkait opsi terbaik untuk menekan biaya tanpa mengurangi kualitas.
Kolaborasi dengan Tim Teknis:
Berkoordinasi dengan tim desain, insinyur mekanikal, dan elektrikal untuk memastikan estimasi biaya sesuai dengan rencana teknis proyek cold storage.
Memastikan bahwa estimasi biaya mencerminkan semua aspek pekerjaan, termasuk risiko tambahan atau modifikasi yang mungkin diperlukan selama pelaksanaan proyek.
Review dan Update Biaya Proyek:
Melakukan review berkala terhadap estimasi biaya dan memperbarui perhitungan jika ada perubahan spesifikasi atau kondisi proyek.
Mengkomunikasikan perubahan anggaran kepada tim proyek dan klien jika terjadi perubahan dalam skala proyek.
Monitoring Anggaran Selama Proyek Berlangsung:
Memantau penggunaan anggaran selama proyek berlangsung untuk memastikan bahwa biaya aktual sesuai dengan estimasi yang telah disusun.
Memberikan laporan keuangan dan analisis biaya kepada manajemen untuk memantau efisiensi penggunaan dana.
Spesifikasi dan Kualifikasi:
Kualifikasi Pendidikan:
Minimal D3/S1 dalam bidang Teknik Sipil, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Mesin, atau jurusan terkait.
Pengalaman atau sertifikasi di bidang estimasi proyek atau cost engineering merupakan nilai tambah.
Pengalaman Kerja:
Pengalaman minimal 1-2 tahun sebagai Estimator di proyek konstruksi, terutama yang melibatkan sistem pendingin, HVAC, atau cold storage.
Pengalaman di bidang vendor/kontraktor atau konstruksi teknis yang serupa lebih diutamakan.
Keahlian Teknis:
Kemampuan menghitung estimasi biaya proyek dengan akurat, termasuk material, peralatan, dan tenaga kerja yang dibutuhkan.
Penguasaan software estimasi proyek seperti AutoCAD, Revit, atau software lain.
Kemampuan membaca dan memahami blueprint dan spesifikasi teknis
Kemampuan Analisis:
Kemampuan analitis yang kuat untuk mengevaluasi biaya proyek, menganalisis data dari vendor, dan memberikan opsi penghematan biaya tanpa mengurangi kualitas proyek.
Detail-oriented dalam menyusun estimasi biaya dan proposal untuk memastikan semua aspek proyek telah diperhitungkan dengan baik.
Kompetensi Tambahan:
Pemahaman tentang proses pengadaan dan negosiasi harga dengan vendor dan pemasok.
Manajemen risiko.
Soft Skills:
Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik 
Kemampuan manajemen waktu 
Kemampuan negosiasi

At Jiva, we are dedicated to improving the livelihood of smallholder farmers around the world. We focus on providing access to financing, practical advice, quality products & fairer trade practices through our digital products. Currently, a lack of accessibility to such services is holding half a billion people behind. We believe that technology is the only viable unifying force for this complex sector & the only way to achieve “benefits of scale”.
Job Description
We are looking for developers responsible for the development and maintenance of Jiva's suite of applications. We currently operate a service-based architecture that powers 3 android apps, as well as having 100s of real-world integration points from farmers, logistics providers, financial tools, space satellite data and more. Jiva's user base, scope and team are all growing rapidly. We are looking for backend developers who are looking for a challenging, fast-paced and rewarding career.
Responsibilities
Write well-tested and maintainable code in Ruby on Rails and Elixir
Help source, design and implement APIs to power and enhance our apps
Identify and rectify performance bottlenecks to ensure services are functional and reliable as we scale
Stress-test services and maintain their functionality in production
Establish comprehensive audit processes to monitor ongoing performance of our services in production
Work closely with teams across functions to figure out what we should be building next
Required Skills
Minimum 2 years as a software developer
Strong oral and written communication skills
Proven ability to work on multiple services and switch contexts as the situation requires
Experience with RESTful / GraphQL APIs

About us
Founded in 1995, PT. Weltes Energi Nusantara is a multi-disciplinary Engineering, Procurement, Construction (EPC), and Fabrication Manufacturer Company in Indonesia with over 20 years of experience. The company's scope of business includes Sugar Plant, Mineral, environmental, and Infrastructure. As an Industrial Engineering Company, our main goal is to provide the best solutions for our clients by focusing on improving the total cost efficiency of ownership without affecting the quality of production itself.

Berpengalaman minimal 2 tahun, diutamakan yang sudah pernah bekerja di lokasi site project.

Pendidikan : D3/S1 Teknik Mesin/Perkapalan, Teknik Perpipaan , Teknik Sipil, Pengelasan.
Khusus QC Mekanikal/Piping Memiliki sertifikat Welding Inspector, NDT (PT/UT/MT), menguasai teknik pengelasan dan NDT, berpengelaman dalam melakukan inspeksi visual, dimensi, welding, NDT, Pressure test.
Menguasai software Autocad menjadi nilai tambah.
Menguasai teknik pengelasan dan NDT.
Khsus QC Sipil mempunyai pengalaman dalam pengecekan kualitas struktur beton,baja & pekerjaan arsitektural.
   Tasks & responsibilities
Memastikan material dan peralatan yang digunakan sesuai dengan spesifikasi dan standar kualitas yang ditetapkan.

Mengawasi dan memantau proses produksi untuk memastikan semua tahapan sesuai dengan prosedur QC.
Membuat dan memelihara catatan inspeksi, laporan non-kepatuhan, dan dokumentasi QC lainnya.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim proyek untuk memastikan semua pekerjaan dilakukan sesuai dengan standar kualitas dan jadwal yang telah ditetapkan.
Melakukan berbagai tes dan pengujian, seperti tes visual, tes radiografi, tes ultrasonik, dan metode pengujian lainnya sesuai kebutuhan.
Memastikan bahwa semua pekerjaan sesuai dengan kode, standar, dan regulasi yang berlaku, termasuk standar internasional seperti ASME, AWS, dan ISO.
Menyusun dan menyampaikan laporan inspeksi serta temuan kepada manajemen dan pihak terkait lainnya.
Mengawasi pekerjaan perbaikan dan rework untuk memastikan bahwa pekerjaan tersebut dilakukan dengan benar dan sesuai dengan spesifikasi.

 Cuti

Job Description: 
Kandidat akan bertanggung jawab melakukan semua aspek desain komponen mekanik pada produk audio (Amplifier, speaker, dll.). Kandidat akan terlibat dalam semua tahapan pengembangan produk baru mulai dari konsep sampai realisasi produk siap jual.
 Persyaratan Wajib:
Minimum lulusan D3 atau Politeknik di bidang Teknik Mesin / Mekanik atau bidang yang sejenis.
Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun
Wajib menguasai software Solidworks level MAHIR.
Wajib berpengalaman mendesain komponen mekanik berbahan plastic, ADC atau sheet metal, dibuktikan dengan portofolio.
Memiliki pengetahuan tentang desain komponen plastik dan sheet metal, termasuk cara mengatasi masalah-nya
Persyaratan Tambahan:
Bisa berkomunikasi dalam bahasa Inggris secara lisan maupun tulisan.
Mempunyai motivasi kerja tinggi dan ketahanan bekerja dalam tekanan jadwal yang ketat.
Mempunyai motivasi tinggi untuk mempelajari hal baru terkait produk.
Dapat bekerja multi-tasking.
Dapat bekerja mandiri dengan supervisi minimal ataupun bekerja dalam team.
Lokasi Kerja: Departemen R&D PT. TOA Galva Industries, Jl. Cipinang Cempedak, Jatinegara, JAKTIM
Gaji yang ditawarkan: 7 – 9 Juta (bergantung level kualifikasi-nya)
Catatan: Fresh graduates ataupun yang tidak memenuhi Persyaratan Wajib dimohon tidak melamar.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Mengawasi pelaksanaan pekerjaan MEP
Melakukan koordinasi dengan vendor MEP serta verifikasi pengajuan progres vendor MEP
Memimpin, mengawasi dan mengecek proses pelaksanaan serta hasil di lapangan
KUALIFIKASI:
Minimal pendidikan D3 / S1 Teknik Mesin / Elektro
Memiliki pengalaman bekerja 5 tahun di bidang yang terkait
Memiliki pengalaman di proyek high rise
Menguasai dan mahir dalam bidang pelaksanaan pembangunan MEP bangunan bertingkat banyak
Dapat menggunakan komputer dan software yang dibutuhkan (AutoCAD, Ms. Excel, Ms. Word)
Jujur, bertanggung jawab, patuh, rajin, memiliki insiatif, disiplin, mandiri, sopan
Berpenampilan rapi dan memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik

It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
    Job Description
Core Platform team owns some of the most critical systems in Traveloka that serve key capabilities to both our users and other systems in Traveloka. We aim to provide highly available and scalable systems for managing user accounts and sessions in a secure and convenient manner. The team also provides extensive options to build communication channels between Traveloka and our customers.
As Engineering Manager, you will be responsible for managing a team of engineers to deliver a high quality product to our customers. You will also be working with a cross-functional team to verify problems, discussing the best and pragmatic solution, and working together to realize it.  We work in an open environment where there are no boundaries or power distance. Everyone is encouraged to speak their mind, propose ideas, influence others, and continuously grow themselves. Collaborating closely with various teams, you will ensure that projects are delivered on schedule and meet the organizational objectives.
Day to day activities:
Working with the product counterparts to translate the organizational objectives into a list of projects/initiatives.
Work with the operational team to understand the operational issues and use them as feedback for the product development.
Managing a team of engineers to deliver a high quality product through the participation in brainstorming, architectural/design review, task breakdown, project management, code review, etc.
Participate in the recruitment of the top talents through interviews and giving feedback.
In Traveloka, we believe technology is there to solve business problems. If you are a motivated and strategic professional with a passion for driving engineering excellence, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our continued success.
  Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent from reputable universities.
Solid experience in Software Engineering with minimum 6+ years including 3+ years experience as engineering manager - preferably someone that has experience in building Payment and Fraud related systems.
Fluent in English in both written and verbal communication.
Proven experience in creating a robust and highly scalable system.
Excellent in verbal communication, presentation, mentorship skills, influence skills, and shows personal maturity.
Excellent in problem solving, analytical, and ability to move up and down from solution and implementation.
Comfortable working with a cross-functional team.
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Job Responsibilities:
Collect, analyze, and document client requirements to translate them into detailed system design documents (FSD, SRS, LLD).
Collaborate and coordinate with stakeholders, including clients and internal project teams, to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables.
Prioritize, organize, and structure requirement specifications, data mappings, diagrams, and flowcharts for development and Quality Assurance (QA) teams.
Oversee the creation and review of test scenarios in collaboration with the QA team to ensure quality and accuracy.
Facilitate communication between technical and non-technical stakeholders to ensure smooth project execution.
Monitor and track project progress, ensuring milestones and deadlines are met.
Identify and mitigate project risks, proposing effective solutions when necessary.
 Requirements:
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
Ability to think critically, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Non-smokers are preferred.
Motivated, creative, and willing to take ownership of projects.
Proven experience in project management within a software development environment (.NET, Java, or JavaScript is a plus).
Strong understanding of RDBMS (Relational Database Management Systems).
Experience working with Agile methodologies and project management tools.
Passion for learning new technologies and methodologies.
 Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Project Management certification (PMP, PRINCE2) is a plus.
Experience as a developer or software engineer is advantageous.

Lead and mentor a team of software engineers, including backlog grooming, sprint planning and code reviews.
Involved in system design discussion with Head of Engineering
Involved in incident management, mainly in proactive and preventive initiatives.
Drive technical projects
Contribute technically to projects by owning services, improve code quality, improve development process, and build operational excellence.
Work closely with the product management team & business team in product requirements and review.
Requirements
Have experience 5 years in financial technology industry is preferable
Fast learner & good analytical thinking.
Advanced knowledge in (according to priorities) Go
Have exposure to architectural patterns of high-scale web application.
Have experience with distributed storage and database systems, including SQL or NoSQL.
Have a systematic problem-solving approach and knowledge of algorithms, data structures, and complexity analysis.
Good communication skill, team player and comfortable working with a cross-functional team.
Have a passion for learning, improving and contributing to projects with a strong sense of ownership.
Have experience with TDD.
Have experience with refactoring large systems.
Have experience with event driven architecture.
Would be a plus if you have experienced with Kafka, Kubernetes, Grafana, Prometheus.

Kualifikasi :
Lulusan S1 Teknik Mesin / Elektrikal
Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun di pekerjaan pembuatan RAB (Rencana Anggaran Biaya) pekerjaan MEP gedung bertingkat
Bisa membaca gambar (Mengoperasikan Autocad)
Diutamakan mempunyai SKA Ahli teknik bangunan gedung bertingkat / SKA Ahli Teknik Jalan
Mampu menggunakan software MS Office (excel,word, dll) dan autocad untuk menghitung quantity MEP gedung bertingkat atau Landscape
IPK minimal 3.30
Dapat menggunakan sofware autocad untuk membuat gambar detail potongan
Diutamakan mempunyai SKA Ahli Teknik Gedung Bertingkat MEP
Dapat bekerjasama dengan team dan mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik
Bersedia ditempatkan di Surabaya
Deskripsi Pekerjaan :
Mempelajari  dan memahami gambar tender dan gambar forcon, spesifikasi teknis. bill of Quantity,
Berita acara aanwijzing 
Melakukan survey lapangan dan membuat resume semua perbedaan
Perbedaan antara gambar MEP dengan kondisi lapangan hasil survey
Perbedaan antara gambar dengan BQ
Menyusun dan mereview uraian pekerjaan dalam BQ sesuai urutan pekerjaan dan membuat metode pelaksanaan pekerjaan
Menghitung kwantitas/volume pekerjaan MEP dengan teliti dan cepat
Membuat breakdown analisa harga satuan pekerjaan
Melakukan survey harga material, upah kerja, peralatan dan Subkon2  pekerjan yang dibutuhkan dalam penyusunan analisa harga satuan pekerjaan proyek bangunan gedung

General Qualifications :
1. Pendidikan minimal S1 Jurusan Teknik di utamakan Teknik Sipil, Teknik mesin, Teknik Electro
2. Menguasai Autocad dan Software Teknik
3. Menguasai konsep dasar Analisa Struktur
4. Mahir membaca Gambar Teknik
5. Mampu Estimasi Material dan Waktu Project
6. Fresh graduated yang mau belajar dipersilahkan melamar
7. Mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan
8. Bertanggung jawab
9. Memiliki kemampuan analysis,value engineering dan time control yang baik
10. Bersedia bekerja di lokasi Seluruh Indonesia
